M

main(String[]) - Static method in class application.PongApp
 
menuBtn - Variable in class controller.PreGameController

message - Variable in class controller.PongGameController
 
message - Variable in class controller.PreGameController
 
message - Variable in class controller.RegisterController
 
model - package model
 
moveBall() - Method in class controller.PongGameController
The moveBall method contains the key logic for moving the ball around the field

If gameOn is true (i.e., the game has started and no player has won):
- Call directBall to set ball's velocity & trajectory
- Call bounceBall to detect ball collisions & redirects ball accordingly
moveOppPaddle() - Method in class controller.PongGameController
The moveOppPaddle method controls the AI of the opponents paddle
If the ball is above the paddle, it moves up (and vice versa for below)
moveOppPaddleDown() - Method in class controller.PongGameController
The moveOppPaddleDown method moves the opponent's paddle downward
moveOppPaddleUp() - Method in class controller.PongGameController
The moveOppPaddleUp method moves the opponent's paddle upward
movePlyPaddle() - Method in class controller.PongGameController
The movePlyPaddle method allows the user to control their paddle
The Y position of their paddle is equal to the Y position of their mouse
